Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian?) pottery cup or bowl; orange clay with some silver mica; interior glazed with added red bad lined in white; reserved on the outside except for a brown band at top of fragment; part of sign (?) cut on exterior, in reserved zone.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Sanctuary of Apollo (Naukratis), temenos (said to be)
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.363)
